content:
We recently discovered an issue in the C backend of wit-bindgen related to @deprecated. @James Sturtevant tracked this down further in this issue and it seems some interesting things are happening with the way tuples are generated for C. This is getting beyond what we're comfortable with for C, so I'm opening a topic here to ask for someone to take a look. Thanks!

C: handling of `@deprecated` items results in breaking changes 路 Issue #1156 路 bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen
In WebAssembly/wasi-http#133 @brendanburns reported that upgrading from wasi/http@0.2.1 to wasi/http@0.2.2 resulted in breaking changes in wit-bindgen's C output, causing the following error: /usr/...
James Sturtevant has marked this topic as unresolved.
